title: [Self-Directed] Integrating Vocational and Liberal Education: An Experience-Based Case Study Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in vocational education settings and liberal arts knowledge at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: A process exploring methods for vocational education practitioners with scientific problem-solving competencies to integrate liberal arts education elements. Case analysis centered on combining field experience with theoretical learning.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain core elements of liberal education (e.g., critical thinking, cultural understanding) within vocational education contexts.
Learners can develop practical strategies for integrating liberal education elements into vocational training programs through experiential case analysis.
Learners can formulate and implement project plans applying a liberal education approach within their professional domains.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
